Railgamer: If the crack is from a torrent make sure you check the upload date. There's no way a crack could have been made in a few hours. The full version of the game was released only a couple hours ago. You may be dealing with a fake file or a virus. I saw a 'crack' for Railworks 3 train Simulator in a torrent dated 9/9. Just a word of warning.
